title: PC February 22 - Stellantis was missing from the appeal of the dead at work ... now it has arrived!
content:
Worker dies crushed in the Stellantis factory of Pratola Serra

Domenico Fatigati was 52 years old, he was a maintenance in charge. Employee of an external company, he was working in the plant in the province of Avellino

A 52 -year -old worker, Domenico Fatigati, originally from Acerra, died in the Stellantis plant in Pratola Serra, in the province of Avellino, in the industrial area of PianoDardine. The worker was, employee of an external company, with registered office in Foggia, according to a first reconstruction would have been crushed by a machine around 07.50 this morning.

The maintenance technician, for reasons again To clarify, he lost his life while carrying out an intervention in the engine base department.Compartments The attempts to resuscitation of colleagues before and the health workers of 118 intervened shortly after. On the spot the carabinieri of Pratola Serra e Avellino, the work inspectorate and the ASL.
